mapper.select: SELECT MNG.CREATE_DATE, /* 장애접수일자 */ MNG.CREATE_TIME, /* 장애접수시각 */ MNG.BRANCH_CD, /* 영업점번호 */ MNG.MAC_NO, /* 기기번호 */ MNG.SITE_CD, /* 코너번호 */ '', NVL((SELECT CD_NM2 FROM OP.T_CM_COMMON WHERE LARGE_CD = '1130' AND CD_NM3 = ERR.ORG_CD AND CD_NM1 = ERR.GROUP_ERROR_CD) ,'0Z') error_cd, /* 장애코드(그룹장애코드기반 맵핑) */ ERR.ERROR_MSG, MNG.ACCEPT_NM acpt_nm, /* 접수자명 */ REPLACE(substrb(MNG.MSG,1,100), CHR(10), ' ') memo, /* 특이사항 */ MNG.CREATE_TIME org_msg_no, /* 출동요청일련번호 */ '', MNG.SEND_DATE, /* 출동통보일자 */ MNG.SEND_TIME, /* 출동통보시간 */ MNG.GROUP_ERROR_CD reason_cd, /* 접수요청사유코드 (맵핑 필요) */ '', /* 고객대기여부 */ '', '', /* 접수자 연락처 */ '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR, OP.T_CM_MAC MAC WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 1), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '031' AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL AND ( MNG.org_send_yn IS NULL or mng.org_send_yn = '0') AND MNG.ORG_MSG_NO IS NULL /* 괄호장애 등록 시 */ AND SUBSTR(MNG.ERROR_CD, 1, 3) = 'ERR' /* OR MNG.ERROR_CD = 'USR01' ) 괄호장애만 전송한다 */ AND MNG.ORG_CD = MAC.ORG_CD AND MNG.BRANCH_CD = MAC.BRANCH_CD AND MNG.MAC_NO = MAC.MAC_NO AND MNG.ORG_CD = ERR.ORG_CD(+) AND MNG.ERROR_CD = ERR.ERROR_CD(+)

SELECT MNG.CREATE_DATE, MNG.CREATE_TIME, MNG.BRANCH_CD, MNG.MAC_NO, MNG.SITE_CD, MAC.MAC_NM site_nm, DECODE(ERR.GROUP_ERROR_CD, '1100', '1100', '1200', '1200', '1300', '1400', '1400', '1500', '1500', '1600', '1600', '1700', '1700', '1800', '1800', '1900', '2200', '2101', '2199', '2102', '2600', '2103', '2620', '2104', '7100', '7100', '4100' ) AS ERROR_CD, ERR.ERROR_MSG, MNG.ACCEPT_NM acpt_nm, MNG.MSG memo, '', '1N' acpt_cl, MNG.SEND_DATE, MNG.SEND_TIME, DECODE( ERR.GROUP_ERROR_CD, '1100', '14', '1200', '15', '7100', '13', '19' ) AS reason_cd, DECODE( MNG.ORG_CUST_RECV_YN, 'Y', '1', '0') AS WAIT_CUST, MNG.ERROR_NO, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR, OP.T_CM_MAC MAC WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 3), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '032' AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn IS NULL AND ( SUBSTR(MNG.ERROR_CD, 1, 3) = 'ERR' OR MNG.ERROR_CD = 'USR01' ) AND MNG.ORG_CD = MAC.ORG_CD AND MNG.BRANCH_CD = MAC.BRANCH_CD AND MNG.MAC_NO = MAC.MAC_NO AND MNG.ORG_CD = ERR.ORG_CD(+) AND MNG.ERROR_CD = ERR.ERROR_CD(+) and LENGTH(mng.mac_no) = 3
